channel.title: Project Runescape - 2009 Runescape remake
channel.description:
[b]About this topic:[/b] Im just doing this as a hobby. Im not sure i will be working on it everyday but im pretty sure i will do updates every week.
[b]Updates:[/b] [code]12 Sep 2015 Fixed dwarf cannon 11 Sep 2015 Started christmas event (pickup snowballs & added objects) 10 Sep 2015 Fixed doors in lumbrige castle Almost finished penisroach tunnel Peksa's helmet shop Removed the door in varrock bank All meat eatable finished emotes tab[/code]
Green - Done Yellow - Started or Almost Finished Red - Not Started [img]http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/2007scape/images/1/1b/Achievement_Diaries_icon.png/revision/latest?cb=20150307060912[/img][b]Achievements:[/b] Free play tasks Lumbridge/Draynor Beginner Easy Medium Members Task Falador Beginner Easy Medium
Fremenik Easy Medium Hard
Karamja Easy Medium Hard
Seers' Village Easy Medium Hard
Varrock Easy Medium Hard [img]http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/8/8d/Quest_Icon_Crest.png/revision/20120124060819[/img][b]Quests:[/b] Rune Mysteries Sheep Shearer Druidic Ritual Doric's Quest
[img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/images/misc/beginners_EmoteIcon.gif[/img][b]Emotes:[/b] Working emotes Emote requires
[b]Tools:[/b] Shop Editor Drop Editor
[b]Events:[/b] Easter event Christmas
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img][b]Minigames:[/b] Barrows Godwars Fight pits Fight cave Duel arena Warrior guild Clan wars Fist of guthix Mage arena
[b]Skills:[/b] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2u94ygl.png[/img] *Bronze Pickaxe *Iron Pickaxe *Steel Pickaxe *Mithril Pickaxe *Adamant Pickaxe *Rune Pickaxe *Prospecting *Mineable Ores not [img]http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/8/84/Smithing.png/revision/latest?cb=20120119045447[/img] Smelting Smithables Dragonfire shield Spirit shields Smelting tutors Repair dragon platebody Dragon sq shield Elemental
[img]http://www.draynor.net/static/content/Fishing_logo_detail.png[/img] Fishing tutor Catches Barbarian fishing Fishing guild [img]http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescapeclans/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png/revision/20101010003135[/img] Eatables Cookables Level requires [img]http://images-mediawiki-sites.thefullwiki.org/07/2/7/1/64804953644487003.png[/img] Beacons Pyre ships Barbarian fires Equipments [img]http://i771.photobucket.com/albums/xx354/Magic_Bolero/Icons/Wc_symbol.png[/img] [img]http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/1/18/Farming.png/revision/latest?cb=20120223124329[/img] [img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/8024/Hunter%20Icon.png[/img] [img]http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/0/0c/Fletching.png/revision/20101103040800[/img] [img]http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/f/ff/Crafting.png/revision/20100917030121[/img] [img]http://runezone.com/imagehost/images/8024/Thieving%20Icon.png[/img] [img]http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/b/bf/Herblore.png/revision/20111122180214[/img] [img]http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/1/14/Agility.png/revision/20100116040716[/img] Shortcuts Courses Areas Barbarian [img]http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/runescape/images/5/5a/Runecrafting.png/revision/20100523021151[/img]
[b]Media:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5IFqtB7.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/uetPVlu.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/hsKhQeH.png[/img]
Credits: Abexlry - Source Xenorune - Base Savy

@Project_Runescape wrote:

About this topic:
Im just doing this as a hobby.
Im not sure i will be working on it everyday but im pretty sure i will do updates every week.

Updates:

12 Sep 2015 Fixed dwarf cannon 11 Sep 2015 Started christmas event (pickup snowballs & added objects) 10 Sep 2015 Fixed doors in lumbrige castle Almost finished penisroach tunnel Peksa's helmet shop Removed the door in varrock bank All meat eatable finished emotes tab
